question: Is there something wrong with my girlfriend's butt?
question_content: My girlfriend and I went out to a function tonight and she wore a tight black cocktail dress. I was sitting down on a couch talking to a couple of friends when she walked into my view. She was standing side on to me with a white wall behind her and I noticed that her butt sticks out. Her back and her legs are in a line sort of but when it comes to her butt it curves out a lot. Should it not be a straight line down from her back to her legs? Is she swollen up and dying? Please help, I haven't had the nerve to tell her about it yet in case it worries her....

answers.answer_content:
bum sex

it curves out a lot, 
-- big *** sex! :) haha
